channel.title: [562] Dropping items?
channel.description:
Hey I need some help.
I finally got the wild working in my 562 server. But when one player kills another, the player who died doesn't drop any pvp items nor lose any items.
What file(s) do I need to edit? I spent several hours trying to fix pvp drops, make a working general store and transfer my server to a linux (Ubuntu) VPS. All with no luck. Anyone want to help?
